description:
Not only is claiming to be a woman when every cell in your body consists of male DNA a lie, but it’s also a lie to pretend to hold a female competition when trans women are allowed to compete. Some may call this a violation of consumer protection laws, while others may call it an assault on women’s rights. This is why Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is investigating whether either is the case and doing what needs to be done.


BREAKING: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton has announced an investigation into @USAfencing for violating state law after they EXPELLED a female fencer from a WOMEN'S tournament for refusing to compete against a MALE. https://t.co/Z6Bwt6c
title: Texas Attorney General Investigating USA Fencing For Expelling Female Player Who Refused To Compete Again A Man

description:
Someone should really inform the left that just because you disagree with someone politically, that does not make you a fascist.

Rep. Byron Donalds approached protestors screaming a bunch of slurs at him, resulting in him breaking the news to them that he may be their next governor.

🚨 BOOM! Byron Donalds, running for governor of Florida, walks right up to a left-winger screaming he's a "FASCIST" and emerges victorious

"I'm gonna be your governor, trust me! Oh, yes I am!"pic.twitter.com/3sDxZGdSyv
— Eric Daugherty (@EricLDaugh) April 8, 2025
title: "I'm gonna be your Governor, trust me:" Byron Donalds shuts down unhinged protestors claiming he's a fascist

description:
Not only do many argue that Trump’s second win was done historically, but even CNN’s Harry Enten has to admit that he is crushing it and beating everyone's expectations. So for those who predicted Trump would come in like a “lame duck,” that could not be further from the truth. And according to Enten, “he’s a soaring eagle.”

Enten stated that Trump has signed at least 111 executive orders, which is more than any president has done in a single year. So, while half the country may despise the POTUS and half love him, everyone can agree that this man came in to deliver what he promised.

CNN's Harry Enten on @POTUS' historic effort to Make America Great Again:

"He ain't no lame duck. If anything,
title: CNN forced to admit Donald Trump is a "soaring eagle" delivering on his promises to Americans in "historic fashion"

description:

Don't miss today's show. We have a special Mug Club Undercover.

Ben Tesser, Technical Lead of Trust & Safety at Meta tells our journalist:

- The H-1B system is a "scam."
- Facebook has special "lists" for people like @Timcast and @benshapiro.
- He wants to keep working at… pic.twitter.com/Qt8nxdRZSt
— Steven Crowder (@scrowder)
title: Watch: Meta engineer ADMITS company abuses H-1B Visa to favor foreign applicants over Americans

description:
The left will point fingers and slander nearly half the country as racist while they project their insecurities onto the rest of the world. This is because there is no one more racist than a modern-day liberal, and the more progressive one becomes, the more bigoted they seem to be.

So, while it was once unclear why these same people dedicate so much time and energy to ensuring that no human is illegal, Rep. Jasmine Crockett confirmed what we all knew.

Crockett claimed the reason the United States needs to import an undocumented population is because Americans are “done picking cotton.”

NEW: Rep. Jasmine Crockett suggests the United States needs illegal immigrants because "we done picking cotton."

Crockett made the argument that the U.S. needs immi
title: Democrat leader Jasmine Crockett DEMANDS more illegal immigration because, quote, "we done picking cotton"

description:
John Oliver, host of Last Week Tonight, devoted 42 minutes to explaining that, despite all the evidence, despite what you see right in front of you, despite the fact that two men faced off against each other at the Women’s UK Pool Final, there are no men in women’s sports. He’s wrong. Allow us to explain. Also, Mug Club Undercover sent a journalist to Meta to find out what’s really going on with H-1B Visas.

JON STEWART ON TARIFFS

  • Jon Stewart on Trump's Botched Tariff Rollout & The Stock Market's Meltdown
title: Sources: Jon Stewart is LYING to You About Trump's Tariffs

description:
After Americans rejected the Democrat party's insane social agenda at the ballot box and Donald Trump, the most pro-woman president we've ever had, saved girls sports by signing an executive order proclaiming boys can't play them, you would think we'd stop seeing teenage athletes needing to fight for their right to not have opportunities stolen from them from dudes who couldn't compete against other dudes. Yet, California still needs to California.

They recently rejected TWO bills that would have protected girls' sports, claiming it was cruel to not let boys play in them. One of the testimonies in favor of the legislation, by 16-year-old track star Taylor Starling, has sinc
title: Teen athlete gives emotional testimony over trans student replacing her, being told her protest was like wearing a swastika

description:
Now that Donald Trump is president, there are a lot of people who have the exact opposite opinion than they did when the People Who Controlled Joe Biden were president. For example, the left and the media's (but I repeat myself) sudden concern about the economy, free trade, and the importance of the stock market. "Are we facing a depression?" asks CNN.

"Remember Joe Biden's recession when you changed the definition of the word 'recession' because there was a Democrat in the White House and Orange Man was bad?" claps back Scott Jennings.

.@ScottJenningsKY to host Kasie Hunt, mom
title: Scott Jennings calls out CNN's hypocrisy on the economy, reminds them of Biden's recession: "We spent a year redefining the word"
